paper_abstract: Speech perception and recognition using biologically inspired models is a challenging issue not well explored yet. The paper presents two spatio-temporal biologically inspired methods for the preprocessing and learning of speech signal based on self-organization map (SOM). The experimental results are very encouraging and provide a framework that could be more studied to enhance speech perception and recognition technology. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Spatio-temporal biologically inspired models for clean and noisy speech recognition
